slider.title: Welcome to Orderaty
slider.subtitle: Supermarket in your pocket!
slider.desc: No need to go out and wait. With Orderaty, order all your daily needs with a click of a button and enjoy fresh products and exclusive offers delivered in minutes.

order_type.subtitle: Choose the path that suits your time and needs
order_type.now_desc: Fast shopping, instant pickup. Your order is ready before you arrive.
order_type.scheduled_desc: Organize your time and set an appointment. We reach you exactly as planned.
cats.title: Browse by Category
cats.subtitle: Everything your home needs in one place
about.title: About Us
about.desc:
Welcome to "Orderaty", your first destination for shopping home essentials with the highest quality and best prices.

We strive to provide a modern shopping experience that combines variety from fresh vegetables, meat, and canned goods, with ease of ordering and fast delivery to your door.
reviews.title: Our Clients' Opinions
reviews.client1_text: Excellent experience and the products are very fresh.
reviews.client3_text: Easy to use app and excellent customer service.
